homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  try {
   
  } catch (e) {}

  MyCampusApp.rootScope.mobileAppName = "myWaves";

  function exitApp() {
    navigator.app.exitApp();
  }

  function goToLogin() {

    window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279';
  }
  try {
    function successAuth(data) {
      if (!data) {
        $.unblockUI();
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.alert(
            'Some error occurred. Please try again', // message
            null, // callback
            'Error', // title
            'OK' // buttonName
          );
        } else {
          alert('Some error occurred. Please try again')
        }
        navigator.app.exitApp();
        return;
      }


      /*silent auth start*/
      var waUsername = $.jStorage.get("unifyedusername").replace("@roanokechowan.edu", "");
      $.blockUI();
      var waLoginSettings = {
        "url": "https://kryptosmw.kryptosmobile.com/webadapter2/services/authenticate/rcccprod/WebAdvisor",
        "method": "POST",
        "headers": {
          "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
        },
        "data": {
          "username": waUsername,
          "password": $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")
        }
      }

      $.ajax(waLoginSettings).success(function(data) {
        $.unblockUI();
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.ticket = data.ticket;
      });
      /*silent auth end*/



      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['accessToken'] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['refreshToken'] = data.refresh_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['providerData'] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket = {};
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket[$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').erp.name] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = true;

      /* User info for logging into ERP/LMS */
      var subVal = $.jStorage.get("userSub")
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = "";
      if (subVal) {
        var userSplit = subVal.split('/');
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = (userSplit.length == 1) ? userSplit[0].split('@')[0] : userSplit[1].split('@')[0];
        console.log("user sub= " + MyCampusApp.rootScope.username);
      }
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.password = $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword");

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.isUserTenantAdmin = MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.admins.indexOf(MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['email']) !== -1;


      window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';
    }

    function failureAuth(err) {
      $.unblockUI();
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
      if (window.device) {
        navigator.notification.alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials", goToLogin, '', 'Ok');
      } else {
        alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials");
      }
    }

    var redirectUser = function() {
      /* Check if the user is logged in */
      if ($.jStorage.get("unifyedusername") && $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = $.jStorage.get('user');
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl = 'https://' + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['domain'] + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['gatewaypath'];

        var settings = {
          "async": true,
          "crossDomain": true,
          "url": MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl + "/unifydidentity/open/oauth2/token",
          "method": "POST",
          "headers": {
            "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
            "X-TENANT-ID": MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.tenant,
            "X-TENANT-DOMAIN": MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.idpTenantDomain,
          },
          "data": {
            "username": $.jStorage.get("unifyedusername"),
            "password": $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")
          }
        }

        $.ajax(settings).done(successAuth).fail(failureAuth);

      } else {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
        /* Check if app has only guest applets */
        if ($.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = null;
          //window.location.href = '#/app/MenuListView/MenuListView';
          window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82'; /* Redirect user to home page */
        } else {
          window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279'; /* Redirect user to signin page since it doesn't have guest applets */
        }
      }
    }

    /* Check if the app is running as standalone app */
    if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
      /* Get insititution details from tenant Id */
      var settings = {
        "async": true,
        "crossDomain": true,
        "method": "GET",
        "headers": {
          "content-type": "application/json",
          "x-tenant-id": "rcccprod"
        }
      };

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment = "prod";

      switch (MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment) {
        case 'dev':
          {
            settings['url'] = 'https://seark.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
            break;
          }
        case 'stage':
          {
            settings['url'] = 'https://unifyed-staging.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
            break;
          }
        case 'prod':
          {
            settings['url'] = 'https://api.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
            break;
          }
      }

      try {
        $.blockUI();
        $.ajax(settings).done(function(response) {
          $.unblockUI();
          $.jStorage.set('tenantInfo', response.content[0]);
          redirectUser();
        });
      } catch (e) {
        $.unblockUI();
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.', exitApp, '', 'Ok');
        } else {
          alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.');
        }
      }
    } else {
      redirectUser();
    }

    var handleSwitch = function(btn) {
      if (btn == 1) {
        window.location.href = '#/amakerhome';
      }
    }
    var switchApp = function() {
      if (window.device) {
        navigator.notification.confirm("Do you want to switch app?", handleSwitch, 'Switch App', ['Yes', 'No']);
      }
    }

    var onBackKeyDown = function(event) {
      var loc = window.location;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight = true;
      if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82" && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn && MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/MenuListView/MenuListView" && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        switchApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/Connect/Connect") {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && $.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
        window.location.href = "#/app/Menu82/Menu82";
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        switchApp();
      } else {
        navigator.app.backHistory();
      }
    }
    document.addEventListener("backbutton", onBackKeyDown, true);

    var Notification = PushNotification.init({
      android: {
        senderID: "1012473507211"
      },
      browser: {
        pushServiceURL: 'http://push.api.phonegap.com/v1/push'
      },
      ios: {
        alert: "true",
        badge: "true",
        sound: "true"
      },
      windows: {}
    });

    Notification.on('registration', function(data) {
      var devicePushID = data.registrationId;
    });

    MyCampusApp.rootScope.inAppNotificationHandler(Notification);
  } catch (e) {}

  $('input:text').focusout(function() {
    $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('footerGroupIcons').removeClass('hideFooter');
    $("#bottomPoweredBy").removeClass('hideFooter');

  });

  $('input:text').focusin(function() {

    $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('hideFooter').removeClass('footerGroupIcons');
    $("#bottomPoweredBy").addClass('hideFooter');
  });
</script>

Pre-Planning Checklist
More Information
The old adage that an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure is certainly appropriate here. Students should take the opportunity to take the following steps to be prepared in the event of an emergency:
Sign up for UArts Alerts on the portal (mycampus.uarts.edu) Sign up for Alert Philadelphia so that you are aware of important developments in the city (https://www.alertphila.com)
Download the UArts App to your mobile device(s) and/or tablet. (The App can be downloaded at the App Store or Google Play and has a portal for emergency management)
Familiarize yourself with the exits and stairways in the building(s) you have classes or reside in case you need to make a quick exit
Develop an evacuation plan with your friends and family so that if the University closes, you have a place to go and a way to get there
Save important numbers in your phone such as Public Safety’s emergency line (215-717-6666)
Active Shooter
More Information
An active shooter is a situation where one or more individuals, using firearms, attempts to commit harm to one or multiple people. These types of situations can unfold very quickly and often times, there is no rhyme or reason to the people who have been targeted.
If an active shooter scenario occurs on-campus, and you are able to exit the building safely, do so immediately and call 9-1-1. Notify Public Safety afterwards at 215-717-6666.
If you cannot exit the building, take the following steps:
Do not open the door or go into the hallway to see what is happening.
Close and lock the door to the room that you are in.
Barricade the door with a desk, chairs, copiers, etc.
Turn the lights off and remain quiet.
Turn the volume on your phone or other device off. Call 9-1-1.
Stay away from windows.
If with multiple people, do not huddle in groups. Arm yourself with whatever makeshift weapon you can find if necessary.
Do not attempt to confront the shooter unless as a last resort.
Do not leave until given approval by emergency personnel
Please note that in an active shooter scenario, emergency response personnel’s first job will be to eliminate the threat and not to provide medical attention.
Fire
More Information
In the event of fire, generally the fire alarm will sound and community members will begin to exit the building. However, fires are extremely dangerous and spread very quickly. We cannot assume that you will have a great deal of time to exit the building. In the event of a fire, community members are instructed to:
Pull the alarm to activate siren, if it is not already audible
In an orderly fashion, vacating the building via the nearest exit and stairway.
Avoid elevators
Students with physical limitations should get a buddy and alert Public Safety at 215-717-6666 of their location, generally trying to secure themselves in the stairwells
Once exited from the building, immediately move to the other side of the street, away from the entrance
Shelter-in-Place
More Information
A Shelter-in-Place action is taken when there is a real or perceived threat to a building and there is a need for community members to secure themselves until the danger has passed. Members of the campus community will be notified of taking Shelter-in-Place via the UArts Alert system, which includes, email, portal alert, and text message (if opted in), as well as via intercom system in the buildings.
During a Shelter-in-Place exercise, all members of the community are instructed to:
Secure themselves in their current location.
Turn off lights to the room.
Lock doors.
Stay away from windows.
Turn cell phones on silent or vibrate
Await further instructions from the University (by monitoring UArts Alert, homepage and/or email)
Once it is safe, an all-clear message will be given for people to return their regular activities or to exit the building.

Overview The course catalogue contains information on all active courses offered by the University including: title, course number, credits, contact hours, prerequisites, offering college, priority enrollment, repeatability, and restrictions. Courses listed in the catalogue are not offered every semester. To access a listing of course sections being offered during a particular term refer to the Course Section Offerings page on the Office of the Registrar website.Office of the Registrar website.
